TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LdapSessionOptions extends System.Object

summary.span: 類別可用於取得或設定各種 LDAP 工作階段選項。

span.span: The class is used to get or set various LDAP session options.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoReconnect { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 屬性會指定是否啟用自動重新連接。

span.span: The property specifies if auto-reconnect is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用自動重新連接，則這個屬性為 ，否則為 。

span.span: This property is if auto-reconnect is enabled or if it is not.
The object is already disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DomainName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 屬性會傳回這個連接所繫結的網域。

span.span: The property returns the domain to which this connection is bound.

value.span: 這個連接所繫結的網域。

span.span: The domain to which this connection is bound.
The object is already disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void FastConcurrentBind() cil managed

summary.span: 方法會啟用快速並行繫結支援。

span.span: The method enables support for fast concurrent binds.
The object is already disposed.

exception.span: 這個方法在目前的平台上不能運作。

span.span: This method does not work on the current platform.
An LDAP error occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HostName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 屬性會傳回與該連接相關聯之 LDAP 伺服器的名稱。

span.span: The property returns the name of the LDAP server associated with the connection.

value.span: 與該連接相關聯之 LDAP 伺服器的名稱。

span.span: The name of the LDAP server associated with the connection.
The object is already disposed.

value.span: 如果主機可連線，則這個屬性為 ，否則為 。

span.span: This property is if the host is reachable or if it is not.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::LocatorFlags LocatorFlag { System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::LocatorFlags get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::LocatorFlags value); };

summary.span: 屬性會指定 列舉的其中一個值，該值會在尋找網域控制站時使用。

span.span: The property specifies one of the values of the enumeration that are used when locating a domain controller.

value.span: 列舉型別的其中一個值，會在尋找網域控制站時使用。

span.span: One of the values of the enumeration that are used when locating a domain controller.
The object is already disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PingKeepAliveTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 屬性包含 物件，該物件會指定在伺服器發出最後一次回應之後，在傳送 Keep-Alive Ping 之前，用戶端等候的最小秒數。

span.span: The property contains a object that specifies the minimum number of seconds the client waits, after the last response from the server, before sending a keep-alive ping.

value.span: 物件，指定在伺服器發出最後一次回應之後，在傳送 Keep-Alive Ping 之前，用戶端等候的最小秒數。

span.span: A object that specifies the minimum number of seconds the client waits, after the last response from the server, before sending a keep-alive ping.
The object is already disposed.
The specified time span is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PingLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 屬性包含用戶端在關閉連接前傳送之未回應的 Ping 數。

span.span: The property contains the number of unanswered pings that the client sends before closing a connection.

value.span: 用戶端在關閉連接前傳送之未回應的 Ping 數。

span.span: The number of unanswered pings that the client sends before closing a connection.
The object is already disposed.
The specified value is less than zero.

summary.span: 屬性包含 物件，該物件指定自傳送 Ping 後，用戶端等候回應返回的毫秒數。

span.span: The property contains a object that specifies the number of milliseconds that the client waits for the response to come back after sending a ping.

value.span: 物件，指定自傳送 Ping 後，用戶端等候回應返回的毫秒數。

span.span: A object that specifies the number of milliseconds that the client waits for the response to come back after sending a ping.
The object is already disposed.
The specified time span is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::QueryClientCertificateCallback ^ QueryClientCertificate { System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::QueryClientCertificateCallback ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::QueryClientCertificateCallback ^ value); };

summary.span: 屬性包含 物件，該物件會指定建立 SSL 連接時，用來指定用戶端憑證的預設回呼函式。

span.span: The property contains a object that specifies the default callback function used to specify client certificates when establishing an SSL connection.

value.span: 物件，指定建立 SSL 連接時，用來指定用戶端憑證的預設回呼函式。

span.span: A object that specifies the default callback function used to specify client certificates when establishing an SSL connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性中也會設定物件，指定憑證屬性會被忽略。If the property on the object is also set, the certificate specified in the property is ignored.

span.span: The object is already disposed.
